transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP STATE FUNERAL FOR THE HON FRED DALY AO
transcript.content:
i.
PRIME MINISTER 75/ 95
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
STATE FUNERAL FOR THE HON FRED DALY AO
As a mark of respect for the Hon Fred Daly AO the Government will accord
him a State Funeral.
The Service will be held at 10.00am Wednesday 9 August 1995 at St Brigid's
Catholic Church, Cnr Marrickville and Livingstone Roads, Marrickville, and
will be followed by a private burial.
CANBERRA 4 AUGUST 1995
sses 653
